name: 許益瑞
objective:
The progress of electronic industry accelerates the computer development so that computer simulation becomes one of the important tool in many fields. In this course, we will discuss how to apply the computer to assist the molecular structure design. In order to gain insight into the basic idea of structural designed, the fundamental background in molecular mechanics and quantum chemistry will be introduced. A practical software introduction will also be included in the course.

Outline: 
1.　　Introduction
2.　　Introduction to Molecular Mechanics
3.　　Introduction to Quantum Chemistry Calculation 
4.　　Properties Analysis
5.　　Optimization Techniques
6.　　Molecular Dynamics
